text: 5:17 Akar Mogomem 6:8Egh kɨ mɨtiriar aghazir ekiam ia bagh anemadagh, asɨzir atiabar amamangatɨghtɨ, da ian boribav soghɨrarigham. Egh kɨ arɨmariar bar kurabar amamangatɨghtɨ da ia bagh izam. Egh kɨ apaniba amadaghtɨ, me izɨ bar ia mɨsoghɨrarigh ia agɨvagham. Kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God, kɨ mɨkemegha gɨfa.”
